allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "if exist ""C:\Program Files\Go\bin\go.exe"" (echo Go found at C:\Program Files\Go\bin\go.exe && ""C:\Program Files\Go\bin\go.exe"" version) else (echo Go not found in default location)")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "if (Get-Command go -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { go version } else { Write-Output ''Go is not installed or not in PATH'' }")
Bash(powershell "(Get-Content auth_handlers.go) -replace ''apiError\{Error:'', ''apiError{Code: http.StatusBadRequest, Message:'' | Set-Content auth_handlers.go")
Bash(powershell "(Get-Content organization_handlers.go) -replace ''apiError\{Error:'', ''apiError{Code: http.StatusBadRequest, Message:'' | Set-Content organization_handlers.go")
Bash(powershell "(Get-Content member_handlers.go) -replace ''apiError\{Error:'', ''apiError{Code: http.StatusBadRequest, Message:'' | Set-Content member_handlers.go")
Bash(powershell "(Get-Content middleware.go) -replace ''apiError\{Error:'', ''apiError{Code: http.StatusUnauthorized, Message:'' | Set-Content middleware.go")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge upstream/main: Add go-rod support, place_id extraction, review fixes

Merged upstream changes:
- scrapemate v1.0.0 with BrowserPage interface \(go-rod support\)
- extract place_id feature
- Review extraction improvements via browser RPC
- leadsDB integration
- Various bug fixes

Kept local customizations:
- Docker-compose commands in Makefile
- Web UI and multi-tenancy features
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "$env:PGPASSWORD=''postgres''; psql -U postgres -h localhost -d google_maps_scraper -c ''\\d api_keys''")
